trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides the ability to create events for event tracing for Windows (ETW).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx Xxxxxxx $XXX$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true to throw an exception when an error occurs in the underlying Windows code; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx Xxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the configuration settings to apply to the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the configuration settings to apply to the event source.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The key-value pairs that specify traits for the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx$xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: traits is not specified in key-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx$xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name to apply to the event source.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Must not be null.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: eventSourceName is null.

trans-unit.source:
[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

Gets any exception that was thrown during the construction of the event source.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx 0.0.0 xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that was thrown during the construction of the event source, or null if no exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

\n

Gets the activity ID of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx 0.0.0 xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx XX xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The activity ID of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx XX xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The unique identifier for the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A unique identifier for the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The friendly name of the class that is derived from the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The friendly name of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default is the simple name of the class.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the settings applied to this event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The settings applied to this event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Occurs when a command comes from an event listener.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\ntrue to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a string of the XML manifest that is associated with the current event source.

\n

The XML data string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx XXX xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a string of the XML manifest that is associated with the current event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxx XXX xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify how the manifest is generated.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The XML data string or null (see remarks).

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx XXX xxxx xxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ $xxx xxxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of the event source.

\n

\n

A unique identifier for this event source type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the friendly name of the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The type of the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The friendly name of the event source.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default is the simple name of the class.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a snapshot of all the event sources for the application domain.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An enumeration of all the event sources in the application domain.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the trait value associated with the specified key.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The key of the trait to get.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The trait value associated with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx.

trans-unit.source:
If the key is not found, returns null.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxx xx xxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the current event source is enabled.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the current event source is enabled; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the current event source that has the specified level and keyword is enabled.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The level of the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The keyword of the event source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the event source is enabled; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the current event source is enabled for events with the specified level, keywords and channel.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event level to check.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
An event source will be considered enabled when its level is greater than or equal to level.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xx $xx$xxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event keywords to check.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event channel to check.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
true if the event source is enabled for the specified event level, keywords and channel; otherwise, false.

The result of this method is only an approximation of whether a particular event is active.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: Use it to avoid expensive computation for logging when logging is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
Event sources may have additional filtering that determines their activity..

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx..$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Called when the current event source is updated by the controller.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The arguments for the event.

trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

Sends a command to a specified event source.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event source to send the command to.

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The event command to send.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The arguments for the event command.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

Sets the activity ID on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx 0.0.0 xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx XX xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

Sets the activity ID on the current thread, and returns the previous activity ID.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx 0.0.0 xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx XX xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx XX.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

When this method returns, contains the previous activity ID on the current thread.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx XX xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

[Supported in the .NET Framework 4.5.1 and later versions]

\n

Writes an event that indicates that the current activity is related to another activity.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$Xxxxxxxxx xx xxx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx 0.0.0 xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.
